paragraphs.content: The earth is the LORD’s, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The earth is the Lord’s, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

paragraphs.content: For he hath founded it upon the seas, and established it upon the floods.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he hath founded it upon the seas, and established it upon the floods.

paragraphs.content: Who shall ascend into the hill of the LORD? or who shall stand in his holy place?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who shall ascend into the hill of the Lord? or who shall stand in his holy place?

paragraphs.content: He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully.

paragraphs.content: He shall receive the blessing from the LORD, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall receive the blessing from the Lord, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.

paragraphs.content: This is the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This is the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.

paragraphs.content: Who is this King of glory? The LORD strong and mighty, the LORD mighty in battle.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who is this King of glory? The Lord strong and mighty, the Lord mighty in battle.

paragraphs.content: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.

paragraphs.content: Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, he is the King of glory. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who is this King of glory? The Lord of hosts, he is the King of glory. Selah.
